name: digital-compass-client
description: Client side library for building with the Digital Compass framework

scripts.open-demo: cd example && npm run client && npm run open
scripts.demo: npm run build-demo && NODE_ENV=local npm run open-demo
scripts.demo:firewall: npm run build-demo && NODE_ENV=jason npm run open-demo

author: Arjun Sarode <sarodearjun57@gmail.com> (http://arjunsarode.com)
